  • Constructor Details

    • AnnouncementRequestController

      public AnnouncementRequestController(pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.repository.AnnouncementRequestRepository announcementRequestRepository, pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.repository.AnnouncementRepository announcementRepository, pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.repository.AuthenticationRepository authenticationRepository, pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.application.session.UserSession currentSession)
      Constructs an AnnouncementRequestController with the specified AnnouncementRequestRepository.
      Parameters:
      announcementRequestRepository - the AnnouncementRequestRepository to be used by the controller
      announcementRepository - the announcement repository
      authenticationRepository - the authentication repository
      currentSession - the current session

    • AnnouncementRequestController

      public AnnouncementRequestController()
      Constructs an AnnouncementRequestController. This constructor is used to initialize the controller without providing a specific AnnouncementRequestRepository. It calls the method getAnnouncementRequestRepository() to obtain the repository instance.

    • createRentAnnouncement

      public Optional<RentAnnouncement> createRentAnnouncement(pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.dto.AnnouncementRequestDTO announcementRequestDTO, double commission)
      Creates a new rent announcement based on the provided announcement request DTO, commission, and rent duration.
      Parameters:
      announcementRequestDTO - The announcement request DTO containing the necessary information for the rent announcement.
      commission - The commission for the rent announcement.
      Returns:
      An optional containing the created rent announcement if it is successfully created, or an empty optional if the creation fails.

    • createSaleAnnouncement

      public Optional<SaleAnnouncement> createSaleAnnouncement(pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.dto.AnnouncementRequestDTO announcementRequestDTO, double commission, double listedPrice)
      Creates a new sale announcement based on the provided announcement request DTO, commission, and listed price.
      Parameters:
      announcementRequestDTO - The announcement request DTO containing the necessary information for the sale announcement.
      commission - The commission for the sale announcement.
      listedPrice - The listed price for the property.
      Returns:
      An optional containing the created sale announcement if it is successfully created, or an empty optional if the creation fails.

    • remove

      public boolean remove(pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.dto.AnnouncementRequestDTO announcementRequest, String email)
      Removes the specified announcement request from the repository.
      Parameters:
      announcementRequest - The announcement request to be removed.
      email - the email
      Returns:
      true if the announcement request is successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • createEmail

      public void createEmail(String sender, String recipient, String subject, String message)
      Creates an email with the specified sender, recipient, subject, and message.
      Parameters:
      sender - The email address of the sender.
      recipient - The email address of the recipient.
      subject - The subject of the email.
      message - The content of the email.

    • getAgentFromSession

      public Agent getAgentFromSession()
      Retrieves the agent (employee) associated with the current session.
      Returns:
      The agent retrieved from the current session, or null if no session is available or the agent is not found.

    • createSaleAnnouncement2

      public Optional<SaleAnnouncement> createSaleAnnouncement2(DateTime date, double commission, BusinessType businessType, Property property, double listedPrice, Agent agent)
      Creates a new SaleAnnouncement with the specified details and adds it to the announcement repository.
      Parameters:
      date - The formatted date of the announcement.
      commission - The commission amount for the sale.
      businessType - The type of business associated with the sale.
      property - The property being sold.
      listedPrice - The listed price of the property.
      agent - The employee representing the agent associated with the sale.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the newly created SaleAnnouncement, or an empty Optional if the creation failed.

    • createRentAnnouncement2

      public Optional<RentAnnouncement> createRentAnnouncement2(DateTime date, double commission, BusinessType businessType, Property property, Integer rentDuration, Agent agent)
      Creates a new RentAnnouncement with the specified details and adds it to the announcement repository.
      Parameters:
      date - The formatted date of the announcement.
      commission - The commission amount for the rent.
      businessType - The type of business associated with the rent.
      property - The property being rented.
      rentDuration - The duration of the rent in months.
      agent - The employee representing the agent associated with the rent.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the newly created RentAnnouncement, or an empty Optional if the creation failed.
